info.name: flote.app dark (CSharpner)
info.description: A dark theme for the flote.app decentralized social network.
info.additionalInfo:
The is a beta draft.  It is incomplete.  Not all elements and not all pages are dark yet.  But the main social stream is dark.

I recommend also adding the "Dark scrollbar for google" theme.  It goes well with all of my dark themes.

2020-07-20
----------------
Added better colors for links, profile names on posts, profile names on who to follow, blue-head icon on notifications, profile names on notifications, actions on notifications... maybe a few more.

2020-08-06
----------------
Updated to fix after flote update.
